txt.en: The Dead can be found around the Stone of Erech at night.\n\nYou have encountered numerous Dead around the Stone of Erech and should defeat them in the hope they return to the Paths of the Dead.
You have laid many of the Dead to rest, albeit temporarily.
Night has fallen, and the Dead now wander the Hill of Erech
The Dead can be found around the Stone of Erech at night.\n\nYou have encountered numerous Dead around the Stone of Erech and should defeat them in the hope they return to the Paths of the Dead.
Defeat the Dead at the Stone of Erech
You have defeated many of the Dead on the Hill of Erech. While they will return in time, the people of Blackroot Vale shall enjoy a brief respite from the unsettling presence of the Dead.
Defeat the Dead at the Stone of Erech ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The presence of the Dead in the vale threatens all, but perhaps if laid to rest once more, they shall return to the Paths of the Dead.

While exploring the Hill of Erech after nightfall, you have discovered numerous Dead wandering around the Stone. Judging by their actions, these Dead are ruthless and despise your presence in the vale.\n\nYou should defeat them in the hopes they will return to the Paths of the Dead and trouble the people of Blackroot Vale no more.
Defeat the Dead at the Stone of Erech ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
